evidence: So this is what we mean by X-ray Optical Coupling - using X-rays to stimulate optical signals inside tissue, and then using those emitted optical photons to form an image
... merging X-ray imaging and optical imaging - two worlds that traditionally don’t overlap much.
X-rays penetrate deeply and travel straight, while optical imaging provides rich molecular and functional information.
So this is what we mean by X-ray Optical Coupling - using X-rays to stimulate optical signals inside tissue, and then using those emitted optical photons to form an image.
